snippet: Credit Suisse on Wednesday named David DeNunzio, one of its veteran deal makers, as the global chairman of its mergers and acquisitions group. The news follows the departure of Steven Koch to serve as a deputy mayor of Chicago.
abstract: Credit Suisse on Wednesday named David DeNunzio, one of its veteran deal makers, as the global chairman of its mergers and acquisitions group. The news follows the departure of Steven Koch to serve as a deputy mayor of Chicago.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Credit Suisse Names DeNunzio as Global Chairman of M.&A.
